overview:
Moshe (Moshik) Raccah, is the managing partner at VentureMind. VentureMind is a Silicon Valley consulting firm innovation scouting firms that provides some of the largest corporations with early information and access to disruptive technology companies in the Silicon Valley.

Mr. Raccah has been active in the Silicon Valley investment and startup community since 1999. His relationships span all major technology companies, venture capital firms including universities, incubators and organizations.

VentureMind’s primary areas of focus include Internet, mobile, enterprise software, communications and mobile/web advertising.

Moshik Raccah is also the co-founder of the IEFF, the Israeli Entrepreneur and Founders Forum of the Silicon Valley.
